ai-tika-s0403t39:46_8: But knowing all the spiritual life, they should cut the spiritual life under him.
ai-tika-s0403t39:46_9: Any woman or man who makes a living for a century or a hundred years old, and who stays for century, becomes more than twenty years old, or thirty years.
ai-tika-s0403t39:46_10: yet you may go to see him like this.
ai-tika-s0403t39:46_11: Herein, Visākhā’s lay followers there Visākhā Mount Vessavaṇa, and the brahmin Benares, the master of the tradition; and the Elder Mahā Kassapa’s tradition.
ai-tika-s0403t39:46_12: Anuruddha, the Evernment of the multitude of a hundred years.
ai-tika-s0403t39:46_13: A hundred years in the family of Bāhiya, Khujjara, and All-four hundred years.
